EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed - 2019 Honeywell Aerospace Supplier Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>2019 Honeywell Aerospace Supplier Summit YOUR REGISTRATION HAS BEEN CONFIRMED <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=supplier}},
Thank you for registering for the 2019 Honeywell Supplier Summit. Your registration has been confirmed.
Please save this email for future reference. We look forward to seeing you at the Summit!
Day 1
April 3, 2019 Pre-Registration: 1:00 p.m.-6:00 p.m. Pre-Conference Sessions: 3:00 p.m.-6:00 p.m. Networking Reception: 6:00 p.m.-8:30 p.m.
Day 2
April 4, 2019 Registration: 7:30 a.m.Conference: 8:00 a.m.-4:00 p.m.
Location
Tempe Mission Palms
60 East 5th Street, Tempe, AZ 85281
